q: The Smile star, who has had two miscarriages, told Piers Morgan she wanted him to give the money to a stillbirth and neo-natal death charity that supports bereaved parents. Writing on Twitter, she said: i'd do it for a million for SANDS. money, mouth?????????????????? Piers Morgan , whose guests on the ITV1 interview show have included Gordon Brown , Cheryl Cole and Simon Cowell , told Lily Allen : "I will get ITV to make substantial five figure donation to your charity for the interview"

Gordon Brown 's office declined to comment, but Labour deputy leader Harriet Harman said police must investigate the allegations. Hacking into people's phones is illegal. Obviously the criminal law has got to be complied with and if it is broken then it should be investigated by the police and it should be enforced, she told Sky News.
